titles.title: Terajima-chou Kidan: Ginnagashi
寺島町奇譚 ぎんながし

anime.description: Ten-year-old Kyoushi watches as a tramp transforms himself into a rich imposter at a stand-up bar in the Tamanoi district. Amusing tales from prewar Tokyo based on the 1968 autobiographical manga Strange Tales of Terajima and written by Takita Yuu for the alternative magazine Garo. Source: The Anime Encyclopedia via MAL
